infinity(Curve2) - Static method in class camzup.core.Curve2
Creates a curve that approximates Bernoulli's lemniscate, which resembles an infinity loop (with equally proportioned lobes).

The curve is set as a closed loop; however, it intersects itself, and so may lead to rendering issues when used with a fill.

inverse(Quaternion, Quaternion) - Static method in class camzup.core.Quaternion
Finds the inverse, or reciprocal, of a quaternion, which is the conjugate divided by the magnitude squared.

a-1 := a* / |a|2

If a quaternion is of unit length, its inverse is equal to its conjugate.
inverse(Quaternion, Quaternion, Quaternion) - Static method in class camzup.core.Quaternion
Finds the inverse, or reciprocal, of a quaternion, which is the its conjugate divided by its magnitude squared.

a-1 := a* / |a|2

If a quaternion is of unit length, its inverse is equal to its conjugate.

invSqrt(float) - Static method in class camzup.core.Utils
An inverse square-root.
invSqrtUnchecked(float) - Static method in class camzup.core.Utils
An inverse square root implementation for single precision real numbers based on the 'evil bit hack' from Quake 3, as described by Chris Lomont in "Fast Inverse Square Root." For accuracy, the result is refined three times with the Newton-Raphson method.

Useful when normalizing vectors or quaternions.

ITextDisplay - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior between renderers which display text to the screen.
ITextDisplay2 - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior between 2D renderers which display text to the screen.
ITextDisplay3 - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior between 3D renderers which display text to the screen.
IUp - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior across renderers in the CamZup library.
IUp3 - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior across 3D renderers that extend different branches of PGraphics.
IUpOgl - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior across OpenGL renderers, even when they are of different dimensions.
IUtils - Interface in camzup.core
Holds mathematical constants used by the rest of the library.
IVolume - Interface in camzup.core
Maintains consistent behavior between objects with volume.
IVolume2 - Interface in camzup.core
Maintains consistent behavior between 2D objects with volume.
IVolume3 - Interface in camzup.core
Maintains consistent behavior between 3D objects with volume.
IYup2 - Interface in camzup.pfriendly
Maintains consistent behavior across 2D renderers that extend different branches of PGraphics, such as PGraphics2D and PGraphicsJava2D.
